DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test feasibility innovative approach increase amount vegetable 's ( V ) intake consume preschool child predominately African-American ( AA ) Hispanic-American ( HA ) .The primary endpoint change V consumption high school child hypothesis puppet intervention increase V consumption preschool child . To achieve project goal , specific aim ( SA ) : SA1 : Successfully recruit 6 preschool ( PS ) center 168 AA 168 HA child 3 5 enrol . SA2 : Conduct individual interview formative assessment PUPPET show . SA3 : Develop manual operation intervention protocols SA4 : Develop 4 videotaped theatre-based PUPPET show developmentally cognitively appropriate use 3- 5-year-old AA HA child SA5 : Pilot-test feasibility PUPPET intervention 3 intervention 3 control HS center . SA6 : Use data collect Aim 5 estimate parameter require conduct group randomize trial evaluation efficacy intervention . The primary hypothesis ( H1 ) test child receive PUPPET intervention demonstrate increase V consumption HS compare child control group .
